ygData.subject: RE: Bard quests
ygData.msgSnippet: You may be correct... this is only based on what I ve read on the Concert Hall.  At least one, or two, of the Bards over there had the same thing happen (no
ygData.messageBody:
You may be correct... this is only based on what I've read on the Concert
Hall. At least one, or two, of the Bards over there had the same thing
happen (no stone), then they did the quest again with the #1 slot open and
did receive the stone, -and- they stated that they had seen the same bug
before with other NPC's (hence the reason for trying it).

And besides, it doesn't hurt anything to give it a shot. But like I said,
this is second hand information and I've yet to experience anything like it
personally.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:slasher@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, October 20, 1999 1:44 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard quests
>
>
> From: Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...>
>
> >I've heard that this is a carry over from one of the
> >old "merchant" bugs that used to be in the game. You
> >have to have your upper-most left inventory slot free.
> >Several bards on the concert hall have reported this -
> >with that slot open you (should) get your stone.
>
> I'll be honest, I've never seen this problem. I think these
> solutions are more speculation than anything. Verant in the
> most recent patch stated that sometimes quests would not give
> any reward and they have fixed this (supposedly).
>
> I would chalk it up to coding bugs, and not pick-your-favorite-slot
> open in your inventory. Again, I've had every type of Lambent Gem
> fall into a backpack slot after it was made 100% of the time.
>
> Harmonic Distortion, 40th unchained melody.
> League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
> < Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
>
